spell_tooltip.description:
Infected Wounds can now stack up to 2 times, and reduces 8% of all healing received by the target per stack.

Infected Wounds can now also be applied from Rip.

While in Cat Form, you increase the movement speed of raid members within 20 yards by 10%.

Leader of the Pack also causes allies to heal themselves for 3% of their maximum health when they critically hit with a direct attack. The healing effect cannot occur more than once every 8 sec.

Casting Barkskin sprouts thorns on you for 12 sec. When victim to melee attacks, thorns deals 124,609 Nature damage back to the attacker.

Attackers also have their movement speed reduced by 50% for 4 sec.

Rake the target for 125,387 Bleed damage and an additional 754,978 Bleed damage over 12 sec. Reduces the target's movement speed by 20% for 12 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 603,727 over 6 sec
   2 points: 905,591 over 10 sec
   3 points: 1.2 million over 13 sec
   4 points: 1.5 million over 16 sec
   5 points: 1.8 million over 19 sec
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.

While in Cat Form, when you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point. Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Mangle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 10 sec.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Ferocious Bite and Maul damage increased by 8%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.
Instantly restores 50 Energy, and increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for their full duration. Lasts 15 sec.
Your auto attacks have a chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Shred, Thrash, or Brutal Slash cost no Energy.

Finishing move that deals instant damage and applies Rip to all enemies within 10 yards. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 143,373 plus Rip for 3 sec
   2 points: 215,095 plus Rip for 5 sec
   3 points: 286,359 plus Rip for 6 sec
   4 points: 359,169 plus Rip for 8 sec
   5 points: 434,404 plus Rip for 10 sec
Shred deals 20% increased damage and Brutal Slash deals 15% increased damage against bleeding targets.

Tiger's Fury lasts 5 additional seconds.

Your combo point-generating abilities' direct damage is increased by 40% of your Haste.
Rake also applies Rake to 1 additional nearby target.

Ferocious Bite deals 15% increased damage.

For each Combo Point spent, Ferocious Bite's primary target takes 3% increased damage from your Cat Form bleed and other periodic abilities for 4 sec.

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec, and deal 60% increased damage for its full duration.

While stealthed, Shred deals 60% increased damage, has double the chance to critically strike, and generates 1 additional combo point.
Finishing moves have a 6% chance per combo point spent to make your next Rake or Shred deal damage as though you were stealthed.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Ferocious Bite also deals 98,796 damage per combo point spent to all nearby enemies affected by your Rip. Spending extra Energy on Ferocious Bite increases damage dealt by up to 100%. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Rake damage increased by 30%, and Rake causes an Infected Wound in the target, reducing the target's movement speed by 20% for 12 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to make your next Regrowth or Entangling Roots instant, free, and castable in all forms.

Go Berserk for 15 sec. While Berserk:

Generate 1 combo point every 1.5 sec. Combo point generating abilities generate 1 additional combo point. Finishing moves restore up to 3 combo points generated over the cap.

All attack and ability damage is increased by 15%.
Rip damage increased by 20%.
Ferocious Bite deals 12% increased damage and an additional 12% during Tiger's Fury.

Tiger's Fury causes your next 3 finishing moves to restore 1 combo point.

Tiger's Fury also increases the periodic damage of your bleeds by an additional 10% for their full duration.
Reduces the cooldown of Berserk by 60 sec.
During Berserk your combo point-generating abilities bleed the target for an additional 150% of their direct damage over 8 sec.

Strikes all nearby enemies with a massive slash, inflicting 336,479 Physical damage. Deals 15% increased damage against bleeding targets. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Awards 1 combo point.
Finishing moves have a 12% chance per combo point spent to grant 10% Haste for 6 sec.
When you use 3 different combo point-generating abilities within 4 sec, the damage of your next 3 Rips or Ferocious Bites is increased by 25% for their full duration.

Command a swarm that heals 350,270 or deals 744,851 Nature damage over 9.6 sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by 25%.

Upon expiration, finds a new target, preferring to alternate between friend and foe up to 3 times.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your finishing moves grant 2 Energy per combo point spent and deal 5% increased damage.
Applying Rip to a target also applies a Tear that deals 15% of the new Rip's damage over 6.4 sec.
Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 20% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
Rip damage has a 6.0% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.

Your auto-attacks have a chance to make your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.

Ravage
Finishing move that slashes through your target in a wide arc, dealing Physical damage per combo point to your target and consuming up to 25 additional Energy to increase that damage by up to 100%. Hits all other enemies in front of you for reduced damage per combo point spent. 

1 point: 194,818 damage, 73,491 in an arc
2 points: 388,047 damage, 148,076 in an arc
3 points: 566,996 damage, 219,612 in an arc
4 points: 772,783 damage, 300,112 in an arc
5 points: 962,891 damage, 370,767 in an arc

Your maximum Energy and Rage are increased by 20.

Frenzied Regeneration also increases your maximum health by 10%.

Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes 173,196 damage over 6 sec and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by 4%.

Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death. If a Dreadful Wound benefiting from Tiger's Fury is re-applied, the new Dreadful Wound deals damage as if Tiger's Fury was active.
Ferocious Bite and Rampant Ferocity damage increased by 10% and Primal Wrath's direct damage increased by 60%.

Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration persist in Cat Form.

When transforming from Bear to Cat Form, you retain 80% of your Bear Form armor and health for 6 sec.

For 6 sec after entering Bear Form, you heal for 10% of damage taken over 8 sec.

Ravage increases your Agility by 8% and the armor granted by Ironfur by 20% for 8 sec.

Your first Tiger's Fury after entering combat makes your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.
Stampeding Roar's duration is increased by 25%.

Frenzied Regeneration can be cast in Cat Form for 40 Energy.

Bear Form reduces magic damage you take by 4%.

Shred and Brutal Slash damage increased by 6%. Mangle damage increased by 25%.
Every attack with an Energy cost that you cast extends the duration of your Dreadful Wounds by 0.6 sec, up to 8 additional sec.
Shred, Brutal Slash, and Mangle's critical strike chance and critical strike damage are increased by 15%.
During Berserk, Shred, Brutal Slash, and Thrash have a 25% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.

Increases Typhoon's radius by 20% and its range by 5 yds.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.

Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.
Instantly restores 50 Energy, and increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for their full duration. Lasts 15 sec.
Your auto attacks have a chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Shred, Thrash, or Brutal Slash cost no Energy.

Finishing move that deals instant damage and applies Rip to all enemies within 10 yards. Lasts longer per combo point.

Maximum Energy increased by 40 and Energy regeneration increased by 15%.
